Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       Nighteyes had set herself up monitoring the Black Fortress. There had 
been alot of activity there, and if an oppertunity to attack opened itself up 
she was to report back to Hell Beast immedietly. Next to her loomed the new 
bot, Craken. He was really strange and quiet. Nighteyes didnt suspect he 
would remain with Hell Beasts group for very long.
       "Alright, Im reciving some transmissions from the base. Looks like all 
we do now is wait." She said as she glanced at a green screen that streamed 
with data.
       Her counter part nodded. "This is good. If they do detect us..." He 
said. Nighteyes wasnt sure if he was asking a question, or making a statement.
       She went back to monitoring, while Craken stared off into the distance 
on his own.

       

--part1_22.120d309f.27c05772_boundary
